segments.text: I feel sick looking at this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and it’s just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and it’s just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and it’s going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, not even caring about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is getting ruined, and it’s just disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, not even helping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a complete mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans this up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
